title: Carlos Goes to School
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 40 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L, Fiction Series
description: Carlos Goes to School introduces readers to the print vocabulary for the names of familiar items taken to school. The familiar situation, repeated sentence pattern, and picture-to-text correspondence help early readers make meaningful connections.
reviewWords: backpack, crayons, eraser, pencils, ruler, sweater
awareness: Rhyme                : Listen for words that rhyme
phonics: Sound Symbol Relationship : Associate the letter h with the /h/ sound
grammar: Proper Nouns                : Understand that some words name things
wordWork: Categorize Words                : Categorize words associated with school
